1.0.3: Updated links to JIRA documentation to open in new tab.
1.0.4: Fixed issue with JIRA API scopes when obtaining labels.
1.0.5: Fixed issue with JIRA API scopes when obtaining reporters.
1.0.6: NewIssue, UpdatedIssue: now works with timezones correctly.
1.0.8: CreateIssue, UpdateIssue: Assignee field now only display assignees available for the project in the selection. The endpoint used for creating fields of both components has been updated to no longer use the deprecated one.
1.1.0: UpdateIssue: add update status field. The status can only be selected from the list of available options after entering the Issue ID or Key, as the status is dependent on the specific issue. Alternatively, you may directly enter the status ID.
1.2.0: Find Issue Transitions: The new component allows you to find available issue transitions either by searching for them by name or by listing all available transitions.
1.2.1: Auth: remove npm dependencies from the auth.js.
1.2.2: CreateProject, UpdateProject, AssignIssue: fixed "Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'includes')" error.
1.3.0: Auth: when creating a new connection, there is an option to specify the JIRA Cloud Site.
1.4.0: Added new component - Get Instance Info: Retrieves information about the Jira instance.
Use svg icon instead of png in all components.
2.0.0: (breaking change) Updated FindIssues, NewIssue, and UpdatedIssue components to use the new JQL enhanced search API endpoint instead of the deprecated /rest/api/3/search endpoint.
